mapper.select: SELECT fv.id, fv.name, fv.unit, fv.fee_key_id, fk.id, fk.name fee_key_name FROM fee_value fv JOIN fee_key fk on fv.fee_key_id = fk.id WHERE fk.is_deleted = 0 AND fv.is_deleted = 0 AND fv.id IN (SELECT fee_value_id FROM apartment_fee_value WHERE is_deleted = 0 AND apartment_id = #{id})
